to chr1ll337
Your online profile will get BANNED once MS does a ban wave because as soon as u put your disc in to ur xbox it saves it under you settings on the far right under hard drive memory it will save the date u played it and also there is a hidden save file so unless u play off line and keep your xbox off line until after the release date u will get banned if u do decide to play make sure u go to those settings and erase all saved data before u plug ur xbox back on line so I hope u finish the campang before the release date - um this is what i've heard i take no responsability if MS bans ur consol hard drive and ur on line profile

Hi guys.I can see that there is only the ISO incide and no Image=DVD like the most of the 360 games..And i always use both to burn the games using the image and stuff.So can anyone or u @Morck22 could tell me how to make an image for this game.?And second is this game for that "J Tag" thing (I don't know exactly what is this)or just normal IMG burning to a DL DVD and then happy times..??

to Dimmis80:

You don't need the dvd file to burn. Just make sure you have your layer break in your options set to user specified and Sectors in LO at 1913760. or if you want the dvd file then create a blank file with notepad and put in the first line the LayerBreak=1913760 and in the second line the name of the iso file (this would be the name of file you open with the rar files) and then save the file as, let say, Call of Duty Black Ops.dvd. As long as you have the name of the .iso file it doesn't care what you call the dvd file. Example is below:

LayerBreak=1913760
File.iso

BEING BANNED:

I have banned before and it is only the box, so I had to buy a new box. My profile however is safe and I still have my gamer score and everything else attached to my profile. If you get banned, here is what you need to do to RECOVER. When you get the new box you just log into LIVE and recover you profile to the new box.
